HTMLMediaElementError.summary:
The HTMLMediaElement.error property is the
object for the most recent error, or null if
there has not been an error. When an event is received by the
element, you can determine details about what happened by examining this object.

remarks.para:
-: Interface used to define the HTMLMediaElement.error property
-audio and video

HTMLMediaElementError.value:
A object describing the most recent error to occur on the
media element or null if no errors have occurred.
